conbody.p: This chapter describes how to install on a Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) or CentOS host. The candidate host must have the CPU, RAM, and storage resources required to serve as a delegate host.
For more information about delegate host requirements, refer to the .
conbody.note: If you are installing a single-host deployment, skip this chapter.
conbody.p: Repeat the procedures in this chapter on each host to add to your deployment.
